Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ComputerPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Player

    public class ComputerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Implements a computer player. Also implements the Player and ActionListener interfaces. Uses the Connect4Strat class to make its decision.
    Version:
    5/25/2020
    Author:
    Vivek Alumootil, Mihir Kelkar, Period - 4, Assignment - APCS Final Project Connect 4, Sources - None

        public void makeMove()
        called when it is computer's turn to play. Uses methods available in Strategy interface to decide which column to play in. Then calls game's makeMove method once column is found.
        Specified by:
